trans-unit.source: Word object returned by a preceding call to _Word_Create()

trans-unit.source: The name or full path of the document to open

seg-source.mrk: The name or full path of the document to open

target.mrk: The name or full path of the document to open

trans-unit.source: [optional] True displays the Convert File dialog if the file isn't in Word format (default = False)

seg-source.mrk: True displays the Convert File dialog if the file isn't in Word format (default = False)

target.mrk: True displays the Convert File dialog if the file isn't in Word format (default = False)

trans-unit.source: [optional] Specifies the format to use when opening the document.

seg-source.mrk: Specifies the format to use when opening the document.

target.mrk: Specifies the format to use when opening the document.

trans-unit.source: Can be any of the WdOpenFormat enumeration (default = $WdOpenFormatAuto = the existing format)

seg-source.mrk: Can be any of the WdOpenFormat enumeration (default = $WdOpenFormatAuto = the existing format)

target.mrk: Can be any of the WdOpenFormat enumeration (default = $WdOpenFormatAuto = the existing format)

trans-unit.source: [optional] True to open the document as read-only (default = False).

seg-source.mrk: True to open the document as read-only (default = False).

target.mrk: True to open the document as read-only (default = False).

trans-unit.source: Note: This argument doesn't override the read-only recommended setting on a saved document.

seg-source.mrk: This argument doesn't override the read-only recommended setting on a saved document.

target.mrk: This argument doesn't override the read-only recommended setting on a saved document.

trans-unit.source: [optional] Controls what happens if $sFilePath is the name of an open document.

seg-source.mrk: Controls what happens if $sFilePath is the name of an open document.

target.mrk: Controls what happens if $sFilePath is the name of an open document.

trans-unit.source: True to discard any unsaved changes to the open document and reopen the file.

seg-source.mrk: True to discard any unsaved changes to the open document and reopen the file.

target.mrk: True to discard any unsaved changes to the open document and reopen the file.

trans-unit.source: False to activate the open document (default = False)

seg-source.mrk: False to activate the open document (default = False)

target.mrk: False to activate the open document (default = False)

trans-unit.source: [optional] True adds the file name to the list of recently used files at the bottom of the File menu (default = False)

seg-source.mrk: True adds the file name to the list of recently used files at the bottom of the File menu (default = False)

target.mrk: True adds the file name to the list of recently used files at the bottom of the File menu (default = False)

trans-unit.source: [optional] The password for opening the document

seg-source.mrk: The password for opening the document

target.mrk: The password for opening the document

trans-unit.source: [optional] The password for saving changes to the document

seg-source.mrk: The password for saving changes to the document

target.mrk: The password for saving changes to the document

trans-unit.source: a variable pointing to the document object. @extended is set to 1 if $bReadOnly = False but read-write access could not be granted. Please see the Remarks section for details.

seg-source.mrk: a variable pointing to the document object.
@extended is set to 1 if $bReadOnly = False but read-write access could not be granted.
Please see the Remarks section for details.

target.mrk: a variable pointing to the document object.
@extended is set to 1 if $bReadOnly = False but read-write access could not be granted.
Please see the Remarks section for details.

trans-unit.source: 2 - The specified document does not exist

seg-source.mrk: 2 - The specified document does not exist

target.mrk: 2 - The specified document does not exist

trans-unit.source: 3 - Error occurred when opening specified document. @extended is set to the COM error code

seg-source.mrk: 3 - Error occurred when opening specified document.
@extended is set to the COM error code

target.mrk: 3 - Error occurred when opening specified document.
@extended is set to the COM error code

trans-unit.source: When you set $bReadOnly = False but the document can't be opened read-write @extended is set to 1.

seg-source.mrk: When you set $bReadOnly = False but the document can't be opened read-write @extended is set to 1.

target.mrk: When you set $bReadOnly = False but the document can't be opened read-write @extended is set to 1.

trans-unit.source: The document was opened read-only because it has already been opened by another user/task or the file is set to read-only by the filesystem.

seg-source.mrk: The document was opened read-only because it has already been opened by another user/task or the file is set to read-only by the filesystem.

target.mrk: The document was opened read-only because it has already been opened by another user/task or the file is set to read-only by the filesystem.

trans-unit.source: If you modify the document you need to use _Word_DocSaveAs() to save it to another location or with another name.

seg-source.mrk: If you modify the document you need to use _Word_DocSaveAs() to save it to another location or with another name.

target.mrk: If you modify the document you need to use _Word_DocSaveAs() to save it to another location or with another name.

trans-unit.source: Error creating a new Word application object.
